text: @RealDoctorMike My immune system is suppressed, and I’ve gotten the pneumonia vaccine. Would the vaccine help lower my risk of getting pneumonia complication if I get corona virus? Or is it like the flu where there are diff strains? (It’s after hours so I can’t ask my Dr) 🙈
